1122.title: Yuffie

choices: Shrink her with a permanant mini.
11221.content:
Yuffie was always trying to scam Cloud out of the group's materia, really I was getting quite tired of it. As we'd traveled together, I'd gradually come to realize that my Cetra powers had a few aspects that I had kept from the others. The group was staying at a small Inn at the moment, and luckily enough Yuffie and I happened to bump into each other in the halls. She was heading back to her room from some shopping, and I was on the way to the ladies room. As she walked by, I playfully turned my butt and let out a massive fart on her. Yuffie immediately began to choke and gag, she couldn't believe how much it stunk.

"Oh man Aerith! I thought you were, ugh, the polite one..." I softly giggled at this. "I can't help it if my backside doesn't like you." Grinning mischeviously I pointed my butt at her more directly and farted again, Yuffie choking on the horrendous gases, falling on her own butt as her knees went week from the overwhelming stench. Turning back around I walked closer with my smile growing. "You should get more used to that, because your going to be trapped with it for the rest of your life." Yuffie was still a bit stunned, and stared up at me in confused disbelief.

1221.title: Aerith

12211.content: Tifa silently crept into Aerith's tent in the dead of night. Once again, Cloud had chosen her over Tifa, despite Tifa's obvious physical superiorities. So Tifa decided she had had enough, and found a Transform materia in order to get revenge. She used the materia on the sleeping Aerith and...
12211.title: Butt

122112.content: Aerith shrunk down to just about 3", losing her clothes in the process, and woke with alarm. "Tifa, what's going on!?" she shouted. Tifa responded by giving her a lusty smile. "You had this coming, you little... slut." Aerith was frozen with fear as the now-giant Tifa grabbed her naked body and said, "Since you won't be hanging out with my Cloud any more, maybe you can get acquainted with ass..." Tifa pulled back her mini-skirt and panties, ignoring the flower girl's high-pitched screams, and dropped the miniscule Aerith. She then let the material snap back into place, with Aerith stuck...
122112.title: ... She shrunk and woke up

1221122.content:
Aerith was in a panic. One minute, she was sleeping soundly in her bed; the next, she was naked, shrunken, and stuck in between her friend's massive ass cheeks. It was uncomfortably warm, and the smell of shit and sweat made the flower girl nauseous. She started to squirm to try to find a way out, but Tifa immediately felt her, and put a stop to it by pulling her panties up very tightly, trapping Aerith even closer to her puckered asshole.

As Tifa walked back to her tent, her cheeks rubbed against each other, covering poor little Aerith in their sweat. Knowing how hygienic Aerith was, Tifa knew that this was the perfect torture for her, but she also knew how she could make it much, much worse. Back in her tent, Tifa began pushing out a fart onto the flower girl. Aerith heard the rumbling coming from Tifa's stomach, but she couldn't think that her friend would do something so cruel to her, but she was wrong.

The fart lasted several seconds, and Aerith was immediately shocked by the sound. The smell, however, was far worse. Even Tifa thought it smelled bad, and she could only imagine how bad it was for her captive. Tifa removed her miniskirt and turned her toward her bottom so she could talk to the girl. "Hey, Aerith, you alive back there?" Her only response was muffled screaming. "Well, that's good. Did you like the smell of my fart? Hmm? Would you like some more?" Again, Aerith's hardly audible screams were her only response. "Good, I've got plenty more where that came from."
1221122.title: ... In Tifa's ass crack

choices: Tifa wakes up and needs to use a bathroom
Tifa wakes up and shits herself
12211221.content:
"Unfortunately, it's time for bed. After all, I'm going to have a busy day pretending to search for you tomorrow!" Tifa giggled. She knew the gang would have to investigate Aerith's mysterious disappearance, but if she kept her hidden in her ass, they would never find out the truth!

"Now, I have been told that I can be quite gassy when I sleep... but I'm sure that won't be a problem for you, since you love my farts so much!" Tifa laughed as her captive once again attempted to squirm her way out of Tifa's ass. Tifa gave another sharp tug on her panties before laying down and falling asleep.

Unfortunately, it wasn't so easy for Aerith. The smell of Tifa's fart still lingered, and the sound of Tifa's stomach gurgling confirmed what she had said about being gassy as she slept. Indeed, Tifa released several farts throughout the night, all of them smelling just as bad as the first. Mercifully for Aerith, they were all dry, but that was about to change...
12211221.title: Go to sleep

122112212.content:
As Tifa woke up, she immediately remembered that her former friend was still trapped within her panties. Aerith had stopped squirming, so Tifa assumed that she had finally fallen asleep. Since it was still early, and the others would not be up for at least a couple more hours, Tifa decided to give the flower girl an unwelcome wake up call.

Tifa got on all fours and began to grunt as she attempted to push a load into her panties. Almost immediately, a large wet fart exploded out of her ass, and Aerith woke up as the shit covered her. "Tifa, what are you doing!?" she screamed through a glob of shit, but Tifa could not hear her (nor did she care). Tifa grunted again as the first log was pushed into her panties, which freed Aerith from between her butt cheeks.

Aerith was horrified, but Tifa was not yet finished. She pushed log after log of shit into her panties, as well as plenty of wet farts. When she was done, her panties were about to burst as shit leaked out from the top of them. "Mmm... how does that smell, slut?" Aerith could not answer. TIfa grinded her ass on the ground to make it even worse for her captive. She turned her head toward her behind to speak to her once more.

"Now, I command you to..."
122112212.title: Tifa wakes up and shits herself

1321.content: How should she torture them?
1321.title: Tifa

choices: Yuffie forces Tifa to worship her
Yuffie tortures Tifa with her gross ass
13211.content:
Yuffie had overheard the crew talking of this materia they had found. It's effects were more powerful than any other materia they had seen, so powerful you could cast mini permanently, or even grow! Yuffie smirked as she snuck around, the highwind, going to the room they kept it in. She could tell they were trying to hide it from her, but they forget she's a freakin' ninja! With Cloud gone these fools didn't know what to do. It was the perfect time for her to begin her fun! However the only thing between Yuffie and what she wanted was Boobs, Tifa's more specifically. She was constantly onto her after what happened in Wutai. "We'll see how big those tits are after this..." She says quietly, snickering as she quickly grabs the materia disappears.

Everything had fallen into place as if fate was Yuffie's design. Those who were awake were busy, no way they could hear Yuffie begin her work. Tifa was among those asleep. She sneaks right into her room, pulling out the materia and shrinking Tifa to the size of a bug. "Now what to do with her... I could show her who has the biggest boobs now..." She chuckles. "Nah, She wouldn't suffer enough. I need to think of something REALLY bad. Something that will make her know there will be no more messing with me..." That's when it hit her. Yuffie was a rather tomboyish girl to begin with, and since joining the group she's rarely had chances to wash, especially recently. She always thought she won against Tifa in terms of her ass. Maybe she should rub her superior asset in her face a little. It would be unfortunate for Tifa is she were to fart while she was down there. Just as she reached for her she started to wake up...

Tifa began to stir, feeling strange. It was like her blanket was so much bigger than her, and she couldn't feel the pillow. Then she felt something big and warm on top of her. It was like two giant pillows covering each side of her, forcing her between them. It felt wonderful, Tifa struggled to open her eyes until the smell hit her. Disturbed by this smell, she begins to wake. She gasps at what she sees. It was Yuffie's giant shorts-clad ass as she looked back, staring at the tiny Tifa. "Hey big tits! Well, you aren't so big now huh? I decided to try out that new materia you guys found. It works! Neat huh?" She laughs. Tifa cries out in rage. "Yuffie! You need to change me back right now! We all kept that hidden for a reason!" She pleads with the mischievous ninja, but she doesn't listen.

"Now you see, the problem with that is you never let me have any fun. So I need to get rid of you. The only way I can do that is to make you disappear! I won't squash you like a bug or anything, no you are deserving of more. You always think you're so much bigger and tougher than me, thinking you're just the sexiest person here! Well, I'll have you know my ass is the best in Wutai, way better than yours! So I'll torture you by putting you in my ass for the rest of your life!" She says, a little angry as she talked about how annoying Tifa was, but also happy she was about to make her regret getting in her way forever.

Tifa, fearful for her life begins to beg and plead. Yuffie cruelly ignores her, scooting back and completely smothering her under her butt for a moment. She laughed as Tifa struggled, trying her best to escape but had no chance. Yuffie was the one in charge now. She was the strongest! Tifa was just a bug compared to her and her superior ass. She could feel Tifa attempt to punch her ass off of her. "Sorry tiny tits! You may be able to punch up monsters, but your blows are just lost into my big, sexy ass!" She grinds against the tiny woman, painfully steamrolling her with her ass. Tifa was becoming weak all over her body, the smell killing her. She didn't know she could take this any longer...

Yuffie stops, waiting for a moment. "Hey tiny tits! Why'd you stop struggling? That felt good!" She says, a little annoyed by this. "Haha, did my ass beat you that easy? I told you it was the best! I think you deserve this for doubting my magnificent booty!" Yuffie gets up, giggling as she picks up the battered Tifa. "This may be the last time you see the outside world for a while! Appreciate it while it lasts~" She takes her around to her ass, Tifa weakly protesting against it. Yuffie quickly pulls back her waistband, and throws Tifa into her ass crack. She releases and let's them shoot Tifa in a little deeper, Yuffie laughing and moaning a little as it happens.

Tifa groaned in pain and disgust. The ninja's cheeks were like two boulders as Yuffie pressed them against her. They were covered in sweat and it didn't make it any better adding to the scent of this unwashed bottom. Yuffie wiggled her hips happily, glad Tifa was no longer an issue. She could feel her struggling still, happy an up close and personal look renewed er spirit to resist. Yuffie lifts her leg slighty, effortlessly releasing a long, foul SBD as she left the room. As Tifa endured the worst torture of her life, Yuffie closed the door behind her and left the room covered in her ninja fart. "Silent but deadly, just how a ninja does it!" She giggles, returning to her own room. "I hope you enjoy your new life Tifa, because if you don't, I'm going to have to make you!" She smirks evilly, Tifa was going to be her little ass slave...
13211.title: Tifa VS Yuffie's Butt

info.description:
Giantess story dealing with Final Fantasy VII only. Allowed:
- Feet
- Butt
- Slave
- Vore
- Toilet

Pretty much any thing excluding unbirth. Enjoy!

I've already set up the base chapters, they are all choice chapters. Please expand beyond them! There are plenty of choices. You don't have to stick with exactly what I've done, please add new elements as you go, but try to keep the main theme in your chapters. I encourage anyone reading to use the "Story Outline" tool because it will help you find what you're looking for much faster than through the choice chapters.

GP will be given to any good entries. Use proper spelling, grammar, and continuity, please.
